overview:
Oni has a career that has spanned 15 years working in the area of technology, business intelligence, and mobile development. He started the early part of his career working with advertising teams to create digital presentations that can be supported with the proper infrastructure with firms such as DDB Worldwide and Answerthink.

He later worked abroad as a consultant within the Asian region, specifically on projects related to business intelligence, mobile commerce and mobile GPS. Upon returning to the states, he became a business consultant for various financial organizations working with building financial application architectures and measuring data metric performance on trading networks.

He also worked with new experimental technologies strictly in research that included GRIDâ€™s and SWARM Intelligence. He had also returned to the mobile platform by analyzing and designing consumer mobile multimedia applications.

In 2006 he started CYAPP and took a role as acting CEO and President. While at CYAPP he designed and architected an accountability driven Project Management System that was driven by both web capabilities and mobile capabilities. The CYAPP application system was designed to be used specifically in government and finance institutions.

At Innovate M, Oni works with our corporate clients to map out business strategies that provide the most impact and measurable ROI from their digital campaigns.
